name: @midnight-pay/pay-contract
description: ZkSalaria - Private Payroll System Smart Contract
author: Midnight Developer

scripts._compile-contracts: echo 'Compiling payroll contract...' && compact compile src/payroll.compact ./src/managed/payroll && touch .compile-cache && echo 'Payroll contract compiled and cached'
scripts.build: npm run compile && rm -rf dist && tsc && cp -Rf ./src/managed ./dist/managed && npm run update-api-resources
scripts.update-api-resources: npm run update-api-resources:compiler && npm run update-api-resources:keys
scripts.update-api-resources:keys: mkdir -p ../pay-api/public/keys ../pay-api/public/zkir && cp src/managed/payroll/keys/* ../pay-api/public/keys/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp src/managed/payroll/zkir/* ../pay-api/public/zkir/ 2>/dev/null || true && npm run copy-keys-to-ui
scripts.copy-keys-to-ui: mkdir -p ../pay-ui/public/keys ../pay-ui/public/zkir && cp src/managed/payroll/keys/* ../pay-ui/public/keys/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp src/managed/payroll/zkir/* ../pay-ui/public/zkir/ 2>/dev/null || true && echo 'Payroll circuit keys copied to pay-ui'
